00017 /* BSD and Mac OS X command differs from the Linux one. */
00018 #ifdef BSD_LIKE_SYSTEM
00019 #define STATCMD "LANG=C stat -f \"%Su %Sg %Lp %u %g %z %a %m %c %HT\" "
00020 #else
00021
